comments.author: 24Kt
comments.body: As we have thousands of alts already, what are your goals for this project? Because what I am seeing here is that you don't have an official website at the moment. So who are you catering with this project? People will mine or stake the coins, but after that they will sell once listed. But who will buy if there's no reason for them to buy the coin? There should be some purpose, otherwise, I don't think you can get value in the trading market.

comments.author: kamelbendali
comments.body: Wait, wedon't have A NETWORK ATLEAST, then we will talk about staking and mining !Ps : for the devs, add some goals, a roadmap ! ADDNODE DONEwhen will mining be possible ?

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: Quote from: 24Kt on May 08, 2022, 08:31:37 PMAs we have thousands of alts already, what are your goals for this project? Because what I am seeing here is that you don't have an official website at the moment. So who are you catering with this project? People will mine or stake the coins, but after that they will sell once listed. But who will buy if there's no reason for them to buy the coin? There should be some purpose, otherwise, I don't think you can get value in the trading market.I wish everyone is as concerned on protecting themselves against fraud. All this necessary links are meant to be provided with the available community to join and discuss, not a vague information. I noticed some old accounts are more active in the forum. They enjoy the discussion since the bull is over and trading had reduced. Such detailed information will be something to work with for potential investors.
